text: Marcin Wrona (25 March 1973 - 19 September 2015) was a Polish director and screenwriter. His movies The Christening and Demon were both shown at the Toronto International Film Festival (TIFF) in 2010 and 2015, respectively. Wrona was born in Tarn√≥w. His wife, Olga Szymanska, served as a producer for Demon. Wrona was found dead hanging on 19 September 2015 at a hotel room in Gdynia. He was 42. His death was ruled a suicide. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1973 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Polish movie directors Category:Polish screenwriters Category:Suicides by hanging Category:Writers who committed suicide
title: Marcin Wrona
